GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.33 to before v4.9.337
GSD.description:
misc: sgi-gru: fix use-after-free error in gru_set_context_option, gru_fault and gru_handle_user_call_os

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.337 by commit f99d5f1bd8cd1e99931b6e5544a5601a1fe33f82, it was introduced in version v2.6.33 by commit 55484c45dbeca2eec7642932ec3f60f8a2d4bdbf. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: misc: sgi-gru: fix use-after-free error in gru_set_context_option, gru_fault and gru_handle_user_call_os
